title: [ART] Contest/Giveaway Entry Thread
body:
Hey there Summoners,

I am going to run a competition for all you artists out there. 
This thread is the entry thread. I will be posting the official competition thread at 15:00 AEST 26.11.14 . 
How the official competition thread will work. I will be using a maximum of 10 artworks from 10 Summoners that post in this thread. 

**Rules:**

*1. Only one entry per Summoner
2. Only the first 10 artworks/summoners that post on this thread will be included
3. The artwork must be your own work*

**Prize(s):**

There will be 2 prizes for this competition. 

1. The first prize will be a champion or skin of your choosing. Limited to a maximum of 975 RP. (*If you choose 2 champions on sale or 2 skins of lower price or sale that is equivalent to 975 RP then you may have that as your reward instead*). This prize will be awarded to the Summoner whose artwork receives the most votes on the Official competition thread that will be posted at 15:00 AEST 26.11.24 . Voting will be closed within 24 hours. Summoner with the most votes at the end of the 24 hour voting period will win the prize.

2. The second prize will a champion or skin of your choosing. Limited to a maximum of 790 RP.  (*If you choose a champion or skin that is 500 RP for example you do not get the additional 290 RP that is left from your reward*). This prize will be awarded to the Summoner whose artwork is chosen by a Rioter who will remain unnamed whilst the competition is running and will announced upon the conclusion of the competition.

**Starting now. The first 10 Artworks will be included. Good luck.**

**Regards,**
**lols =)**
